website_summaries.verdict: A great pick if you want PUMA comfort but the sophistication of a ballet flat. Casual walkability in a more formal shoe.
pros: Style and design let them pass for more formal occasions
cons: Check sizing recommendations before purchasing as they tend to run small

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: I have several Puma flats and I love them - this is not one of them. These feel more rigid so it rubs against the back of my heel as you can see from my uploaded picture. They're also narrower than my other shoes. I thought because of the high rating that I would like these, but unfortunately this was a big miss for me. Update: I almost gave these shoes away, but I decided to put some moleskin on the back part where it rubbed to see if that would help. It did and after a few months, they're finally broken in.
customer_reviews.author: boomer sooner

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe - but MUST order 1/2 size up!
customer_reviews.text: The trick with the Puma Women's Zandy Shoe is to purchase them 1/2 size BIGGER than your normal size. I am a true 7.5 women's. In 99% of shoes, a size 7.5 will fit me perfectly. NOT SO in this shoe. I ordered my normal 7.5 and it was VERY snug and uncomfortable to even try on. Returned these immediately in exchange for a half size up in the size 8. The size 8 fits like how my normal 7.5 shoes fit without any other padding or inserts. I've worn them all day to work and they are comfortable and stylish. Very happy with them, but MUST order 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.author: TravelLawMa

customer_reviews.title: Bilster City
customer_reviews.text: I have serval pairs of puma flats and most of them feel like sneakers, these feel like pain machines. They pinch in the toes, the rub in the heals. I've tried every trick to break them in and make them soft and more comfortable but they always tear up my feet. I've come to the conclusion they are cut poorly and and cheaply. I don't know why these are so much different than my others but just don't buy them unless you love pain.
customer_reviews.author: Charity J.

customer_reviews.title: These are worth searching hours for!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I got these to wear to a fancy office building. I want them to walk fir exercise during breaks, to a cafe for lunch, as well as walking the 1/2 mile too and from my car. These are perfect. They are comfortable, cute, and have a little bit of a sporty edge so that people will realize why you have them on (not because you have bad taste in shoes but because you are smart and like to get off your butt and move during the dday).
customer_reviews.author: Rae Chull

customer_reviews.title: Great stylish walking shoes for Europe
customer_reviews.text: I wore these on a trip to the eastern Mediterranean and walked approximately 65 miles over 12 days (according to the pedometer on my husband's phone). I would say I experienced slight discomfort on the first day on the top of one of my feet. After that, I doubled up on my no show socks and had no issues the rest of the trip. I ordered a half size up and with the two socks they were fine. These shoes were so much more attractive than any other walking shoe I could find. I wore them with skirts, leggings, and dress pants and they matched very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jamieson Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Don't order a 1/2 size or a whole size up!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these so I could have comfy nice balck flats. You cannot tell they are more sporty if you glance at them. They are comfy. Many reviews say order 1/2 size larger. DON'T. I wear a 7.5 pretty much ALL the time, I wear an 8 in most heels. I ordered these in an 8 and they are too big. So they are getting exchanged. I can't wait for the replacements to get here so I can actually wear them. I'll update my review after that. As far as arch support, I don't feel like they have what you would expect from a sneaker, but just slightly more than a dress flat.
customer_reviews.author: ElizaBeth

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but not a substitute for active wear.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for all day wear. I read other reviews where they chafe the back of ur heel, I had that maybe a couple of times I wore them the first times. But nothing that even warranted a bandaid. After two wears they were fully broken in though. No issues. However just bc they are puma, please do not hunk they are a substitute for sneakers when running, working out, or walking long distances. They are not! Tried walking the park trail in these and my legs were sore. Good for all day wear at the office of casual use. But not active wear.
customer_reviews.author: PeachMagnolia

customer_reviews.title: Goes well with all outfits
customer_reviews.text: Had another pair of these with the matte leather trim and have nearly worn them out, so picked up another pair from Amazon. These have a shiny finish on the leather and fit a bit tighter, but hopefully will break in as well as my old pair. Good shoes that wear well both casual and dressy, matches with everything and good for walking all day.
customer_reviews.author: sam!

customer_reviews.title: PUMA PLEASE bring these back!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes, heart broken that they seem to be going out of production. Not the best arch support but you can fix that with an insole. Otherwise extremely comfy, breathable, and the BEST range of colors. I get compliments just about every time I wear them. They run a bit small and narrow, I have wide feet so I buy a half size larger. They are flexible enough that this works comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Genuine Redhead

customer_reviews.title: I do NOT like these shoes at all
customer_reviews.text: I do NOT like these shoes at all. If you have wide feet...these are NOT for you. They run small and fit tighly around the toe area. My colleague purchased a pair and had the same feedback! I tried stretching mines out by stuffing them with wet newspaper and it did add some space to the shoe, but still too much rubbing around the toes and the heel. They work in theory, but theyre definitely not as comfortable as I wouldve liked. I would not purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Chyann

customer_reviews.title: Not style and fit I assumed from photos
customer_reviews.text: These are a great quality for the price and fit OK (I'm a usual 7 1/2 M and ordered that size), but ultimately were not the style and fit I was looking for. I returned them. There is a small tongue on the shoe that I didn't notice in the photo and the back of the shoe is a little higher on the heel than I like. I think they would be very comfortable with socks, but I was looking for a sockless style.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: if you're looking for a cute flat that works for business but feels like a sneaker, keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: These would have been great if they weren't waaaaaaaay too small. I wear a 6.5 shoe and these were at least a half a size too small. I bought them for a business trip for a week long conference where I'll have to be on my feet all day, every day. I ended up having to use a shoe stretcher to make them work and even then they weren't comfortable. Ladies... if you're looking for a cute flat that works for business but feels like a sneaker, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs D

customer_reviews.title: OUCH.
customer_reviews.text: My feet still haven't forgiven me. My friend wanted to go for a walk one night and I thought "sure! why not? I'm in ballet flats! what could it hurt?" Oh my god, my feet still hate me. These cure little flats haven't been worn since that night and I still have the marks on my heels. I assure you, I had worn them many times before, they just aren't really designed for long haul treks like that. Go to the movies, go to a restaurant with friends, but DO NOT like a friend recommend a walk! especially if they are in the midst of training for a marathon!
customer_reviews.author: Shae Flanigan

customer_reviews.title: If you're on the fence, buy them!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome shoes! So comfortable and love how I can dress up/down with these. I had a hard time deciding between these, the Bixley Glamm fashion sneaker and the Bixley Glamm ballet flat, ultimately the price of these made my decision but I am very glad I bought them. Was to wear to the office but finding how they look so good with just about everything I'm wearing them all the time. Quality is excellent as well. I wear 7.5 shoe, they fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: About 3 or 4 years ago I purchased a pair of Puma ballet flats and just loved them. Got them at Nordstrom's, tried to get another pair a month or so later and was out of luck. The shoes were no longer available I was so bummed, but didn't stop looking for them. Than going to look for something for my husband this shoe appears on my page. I couldn't believe my eyes, I quickly got out my old shoes to necktie size and placed my order. I'm so happy, thank you Amazon. The shoes are a perfect fit and oh so comfortable, these are my summer slip one.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth W. , Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Something is different about this shoe. Too stiff and tight compared to similar pair bought 2 years ago.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of the black patent and these are taking a lot more to wear in. They are much stiffer than the regular black (which are the best, most comfortable shoes ever) and my first pair needed some time to wear in and then they were just as comfortable but these seem to be different and difficult to wear to even break in. I would not recommend buying these unless you try them on in person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A really cute sporty flat
customer_reviews.text: I love that these look a little bit like a dressy shoe and are also a little sporty. They're super cute and I've already loved wearing them for an event I wanted to be a little bit dressier for but knew I'd be walking a lot. It was a fun outing w/ the hubs' work friends where we had dinner at an outdoor patio and then walked through some art studio spaces (Denver -- not too dressy). They were perfect. Don't be confused; they're not tennies, but they are very comfortable for a cute flat. A great substitute for an outfit that could use sandals but you need a pedicure so sandals won't work :)
customer_reviews.author: Antof9

customer_reviews.title: ... these as a gift about 5 years ago and loved them. After ample use they were still in ...
customer_reviews.text: I received a pair of these as a gift about 5 years ago and loved them. After ample use they were still in great shape, but unfortunately they were lost. I found new ones on here and they still impress. I'm a nanny and wear these shoes about every other day to work. I am on my feet and running around basically 90% of the time and these hold up extremely well. Super good quality, extremely comfortable, and very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Stefani T.

customer_reviews.title: I'm just glad I got them when they were on sale and ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit well in length, but I have rather narrow feet and because of this I find them to be somewhat difficult to walk in. If I am not very careful I walk out of them. I have only worn them around the house because I would rather not step out of my shoe and trip in public. I'm just glad I got them when they were on sale and didn't spend a lot of money on them. For someone with normal width feet, they would probably be much easier to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Sera

customer_reviews.title: Feels like sneakers on the inside with the aparience of shoes
customer_reviews.text: They're confortable shoes, and I normally wear size 7.5, but they're hurting a bit my ankle, I hope that as I continue to wear them they expand a little. Probable better to buy the size you normally wear for sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Cinthya

customer_reviews.title: and these are very comfortable while still being work appropriate
customer_reviews.text: I stand a lot at work, and these are very comfortable while still being work appropriate. I usually won't wear a shoe without a sock or liner, but these breathe and are mostly cloth so they don't feel gross. I can wear them with almost anything. I would buy again, maybe in the grey. I went up a half size expecting them to be snug based on reviews, but they're actuallya little loose. They seem to have a fair amount of stretch so I would buy again in my usual size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: one of my all time favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.text: this is my second pair i have owned.. the previous pair i owned i have had for 7 years.. i loooove them.. the look of these are sporty yet classy looking.. one of my all time favorite shoes.. also, if you get these shoes.. keep in mind the threads on the inside may hurt or rub against your skin.. however, i use a fingernail file to file the hard ridges down so they are smooth on my feet.... overall i love these shoes....a must!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Nice to wear with jeans
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes to wear with my jeans when I want to wear something comfortable for walking a lot. They appear to be well made. I wore them all day last Saturday while out shopping. By the end of the day my feet did hurt across the top, but I suspect that is because I have wide feet & if the shoes were a tiny bit wider it would have helped that. I think after they are broken in they will be fine. I usually wear an 8.5 wide but a 9 will do for certain shoes. I heeded the other reviews on here & ordered that half size up. All in all, I do enjoy the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Christie M.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe of all time!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about Puma's Zandy is that I have difficulty finding this shoe! I already have 5 (yes, 5!) pair and am always on the lookout for this style in other colors (like the gunmetal metallic!). The Zandy is the most comfortable shoe I've ever worn and looks great with jeans, shorts, skirts and a casual dress (especially the patent). It has adequate arch support and a very comfortable, roomy toe area. While built like a sports shoe it is a lovely ballet flat, smart and so, so comfy. Please, Puma, do not discontinue this shoe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best flats ever
customer_reviews.text: Best flats ever! I wear them to the office and no one knows they are sneakers. But I walk without any knee pain in them and in a pinch I even worked out in them a few times (not recommended, but think about how much more cushioning there is than poorly designed women's flats!) I also have somewhat wider feet than average and these shoes stretch nicely to my shape. I wear them so much I have been ordering them on Amazon for '2 years now when they wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Said

customer_reviews.title: they fit like any other flat I have in this size
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought they were too tight at the toe, until I realized that the little strap at the toe was Velcro. It was pulled really tight for whatever reason, and once I loosened it, they fit like any other flat I have in this size. I always wear these with a sock liner/no show sock. They still turned my heels black a little bit on the first few wears, but that's not a big deal to me, it rubbed right off.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper M

customer_reviews.title: Puma seems to be the only shoe that Amazon can almost fit right
customer_reviews.text: Puma is the Only Shoe I have ordered from Amazon, that seems to fit the almost right way. Others are too big... Amazon Boots fit just right and seem to be the only Shoe that can be ordered and fits correctly. I don't know what has happened to the American / European Shoe Industry in the last 10 to 20 years, shoes seem to not be sized correctly anymore. Maybe the only shoes that are sized correctly are Cement now a days. I recommend not buying shoes at all off of Amazon unless you want to become a Buyer for Crossroads or Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Lori L

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these because I needed some nice looking comfortable shoes for a wedding I was attending ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I needed some nice looking comfortable shoes for a wedding I was attending in Vegas. If you have never been to Vegas you should know it is A TON of walking. I was expecting blisters so I put band aids on my toes and heels before hand. After walking around in these shoes for more than 10 hours I was impressed! My toes were sore because the shoes are a little tight in that area, but the rest of my feet felt more than fine.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC shoes
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THEM I own 2 pair a grey pair and pink pair. They are so so so comfortable I absolutely love them. Just be aware you have to order a whole size bigger than what you would normally wear. I usually wear a 71\2 but with these I order a 8 1\2 and there perfect. Fantastic price as well .
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes, but not very comfortable for walking
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my trip to Europe this summer. We always walk a lot while traveling, so I needed comfortable, yet nice looking shoes. The shoes do look nice, but they were not that comfortable and I couldn't wear them for more than an hour. I had to buy another pair of walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lj.

customer_reviews.title: I Love These Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have purchase 3-4 pair of Puma skimmers and I love every pair. They are comfortable on my sz 11's. Good quality and I ma hard on my shoes and they last a long time. In fact, some I wore out. Most of all I love the sporty casual look yet they can be worn in a professional environment. Looking forward to new styles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COMFY! Tiny bit snug at first
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my regular size, these were a bit snug at first, but stretched out just enough to fit perfect after wearing a few tines. SO COMFY! I wear with jeans/khakis to work. They have a bit of a shiny toe which is cute so it doesn't look like a full on tennis shoe. My feet are very happy in these! Not much arch support, but this is a flat shoe so as to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Namaste72

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a good pair of walking flats for my trip to Peru
customer_reviews.text: Made my feet hurt, I wanted a good pair of walking flats for my trip to Peru. I bought these a month in advance and tried to break them in. Ended up with horrible blisters and had to leave them behind. Would be good if they were more flexible. I do not recommend this shoe for anyone that has slightly wider feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Crassweller

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful and classy
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and classy. I get compliments all the time. I love how comfortable and elegant they are BUT they are sporty. I am not the most soft-footed of girls as a matter of fact I am down right clumsy, so I love that these shoes have athletic soles so that I don't fall on slippery stairs when it's raining or on metal grates.
customer_reviews.author: Ma Chaitanyo Mahima

customer_reviews.title: Just alright
customer_reviews.text: I returned these because they really didn't fit my feet well. They are slightly narrow in the toe box and I have wider feet. I wore them around the house, but I just couldn't seem to get comfortable in them. We were going to Europe, so I was looking for something I could wear all day. These weren't it.
customer_reviews.author: The Buyer

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about the shoes, the look, style, the fact that they are flat and sporty. Unfortunately they dug in the back of my heels in an awkward way. I walked around the house in them for a little while and knew I could never wear them outside the house for any period of time. They were so uncomfortable to my heels. So sad because it's a great looking shoe. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Snowbird

customer_reviews.title: Sporty and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these shoes, sporty yet dressy enough wear with leggings and a casual dress. Feel like they have a lot more support than typical flats but I've only worn them around the house so far. Will update after I've worn them a full day- feel like they would be very comfortable standing all day!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry S.

customer_reviews.title: These are my new favorite shoe. I was a little concerned because one ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite shoe. I was a little concerned because one review said that it rubs her heel; but, I wore them all day the very first day (and put in about 25k steps) without any problems.They're my new favorite shoe! Hopefully, they last!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect, thanks to reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely purchase shoes online that I haven't gone into a store to try on for the correct size first, but I wanted to try these. This shoe was perfect! I did order a half size larger, as advised from reviews. I have a flat arch and these shoes hug my foot perfectly. They will be a perfect spring shoe and sneaker alternative for a bit more feminine look than my regular Pumas!
customer_reviews.author: shopping4fam

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoes for errands
customer_reviews.text: I liked these when I first got them because I thought they provided more support than other flats. However, after wearing them for over half a year, I have to say they weren't the best investment. If you have some back problems, these probably are not the shoes for you. I can wear them on short errands and they do just fine. However, a day of walking in the city or around time, my feet and back begin to hurt in these. Disappointed to find they are not as supportive as I wished. Will be on the look out for better flats.
customer_reviews.author: Melbry

customer_reviews.title: Love these, needed to adapt them a little for my foot...
customer_reviews.text: I love these, but I had to put arch supports in because I have really high arches. They're also a little wide (and got wider with use) but I have an extremely narrow foot and the arch supports help to tighten them. Otherwise I love them. I can commute in them and also wear them at work without detection if I get lazy or forget to change my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: biochemfemme

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I think the shoe is really cute, but it is poorly made. I have been a size 9 my whole 50 years and my foot is narrow. The shoe is too short and too narrow in the toe box. It's really disappointing because I really like the look of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: sunlight

customer_reviews.title: Great for standing all day
customer_reviews.text: I work in retail and must wear black shoes. I bought these hoping that they would make the nine hours on my feet every day a bit easier. I was not disappointed on that front. However, I purchased them in both black and grey, and the grey pair is slightly larger despite being labeled exactly the same, and after close to a year of wear they are terribly smelly.
customer_reviews.author: MHersman

customer_reviews.title: I don't walk a LOT but some distance from meeting to meeting - not trying to "get my steps in" in them yet but they are amazing
customer_reviews.text: Look reasonably professional in my work as a school administrator - don't get squishy on the inside without socks. I don't walk a LOT but some distance from meeting to meeting - not trying to "get my steps in" in them yet but they are amazing with slacks. I'm going to get more colors.
customer_reviews.author: LLG

customer_reviews.title: They are great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I've had several pairs of these exact shoes over the course of the years. They are great for travel, work or leisure. They can dress up and dress down anything and are (were) very comfortable. I bought a new pair because my old pair was breaking down and found them almost to be completely different. They rub so much around the toe area I got huge blisters everywhere. These shoes used to be great and wearable for hours on end right out of the box, now they are plastic and stuff. Too bad, they had really great product.
customer_reviews.author: NellyW

customer_reviews.title: Sporty and casual
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. I am a 9 1/2 (not wide), and the shoe fits perfectly. If you want a bit more room I'm sure a 10 would fit even better. The first day I wore them they did rub against the back of my foot, but I broke them in and a few days later they didnt rub, there super confortable to walk in. I like the suede and leather look, it gives the shoe a sporty and casual look all at the same time. I also tend to wear the socks made for flats and they still feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L.

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes, very soft to walk on
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and comfortable shoes. I got them because my niece told me they were the most comfortable flats she'd ever had. They are very soft on the bottom. The top can be a bit snug, but it does stretch a bit. I think these run a half-size too small. They look great with everything from jeans to a skirt.
customer_reviews.author: JennB

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these flats and just bought my second set of pairs. (I have both Gray and Black.) For my first pairs, I bought one size smaller as one size up was a bit too big. They stretched to a perfect fit in a very short period of time. So, this time, I bought one size smaller again. Until they stretch, I wear them for shorter hours so that I won't get blisters. They are casual yet are good for dresses, too. Since these are flats, unfortunately there are no arch support. But, they are still comfortable for walking all day!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley S.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: GREAT shoe! I have wide feet, and they were snug and pinched a bit when they arrived. The first time I wore them they were uncomfortable, but I did the socks and blow dryer trick, and they loosened right up. They are now my GO-TO SHOES! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I own!
customer_reviews.text: This are the best shoes I have ever owned. I've worn them all day every day for 4 months now, and I just purchased a second pair. They are so comfortable that every time I try to wear a different pair of shoes to work, I end up switching to these before the day is over. They are just that comfortable! I'm able to walk long distances in them, and they look great with all of my work clothes--pants and skirts. When I need to wash them, I just throw them in the washer and they come out looking new every time. I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of these shoes two years ago and wore them so often that there was no more tread on the sole. I've taken them on just about every vacation - most recently to the Philippines - because they are so comfortable for walking and yet look nice. I just purchased a new pair and got another for my mom. She loves them as much as I do. We both have wide feet, but we're both able to wear a 7M (7B) without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: JW Love

customer_reviews.title: Smart and cute
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair, my everyday shoe! Smart and cute! I even worked out in them! I'm older and concerned about my feet. Everyone thinks it's just a regular shoe. I like looking down at my feet and feeling pretty. More cute and comfortable shoes please! I'm on my feet a lot
customer_reviews.author: Gail Harris

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable straight out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and these work perfect for looking business casual and walking the halls at school. I wore them out of the box to work and my feet didn't hurt at all. Totally worth it! I should buy more for when I wear these down! New favorite work show!
customer_reviews.author: Jpjo

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Puma!
customer_reviews.text: What a great, comfortable shoe pair of shoes!. I put them on as soon as I took them out of the box. Never felt sore, no blisters, just comfort and a feeling of serious well-being for my feet. Now that't a real pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: A little snug.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my last pair of Zandy flats, which were worn out. I bought the same size thinking they would be just as comfortable. Sadly they are not and feel a tad on the right side. I'm hoping they will relax with wear, but as of now, I wish I had bought a half size up. I would have returned them, but I threw out the box without really considering that fit might be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing style and comfort right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing! The perfect mix of sporty to wear around town and yet clean/cute enough to wear at work. I'm a solid 8, and these fit me perfect. Right out of the box they're easy to wear all day, with no need to break in or band-aid the heels to protect from blisters. My feet are a tad on the wide side, and these shoes have enough stretch to accommodate that. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: SRIA

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL FOR WORKING ON YOUR FEET
customer_reviews.text: I WORKED AT THE AIRPORT AND WAS ON MY FEET RUNNING AROUND FROM 8-10 HOURS A DAY. MY FEET NEVER HURT, NEVER GOT SWOLLEN AND I NEVER GOT IN TROUBLE CAUSE THEY LOOK CUTE LIKE SHOES NOT SNEAKERS. ABSOLUTELY GREAT SHOE
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: They feel good while they are on
customer_reviews.text: They fit Well. I'm on my feet because I'm a teacher. They feel good while they are on, but the balls of my feet ache when I take them off at night. I hate that because they look so cute. So, I wear them sporadically. Not my daily shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Another Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these Zandy's
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't provide great arch support (your typical flats) but it's the most comfortable shoe to wear all day. It's very cute, stylist, and functional. I love that it's a slip on and makes your feet look smaller than a pair of tennis shoes. It's a perfect pair or shoes to wear doing anything. I've owned three pairs.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy for this teacher! A little snug, but after 8.5 hours on my feet today, I'd say they pass the test. You might want to go up a half size, though. I wear a 9.5 or 10 and I ordered a 10. They could still be a little roomier, but I imagine they will break in a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C

customer_reviews.title: Messed up sizing?
customer_reviews.text: I have two other pairs of this shoe and ordered the same size, but these are a bit tight and I'm not sure I can wear them! I unfortunately missed the return deadline so I'm not sure what I'll do...they don't stretch because of the material. But, if you can get the right size these are really cute!
customer_reviews.author: exactlywhat

customer_reviews.title: Fake?
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in these shoes. I have been looking for some Puma Zandy's after having two prior pairs that I loved. I highly suspect that these are not authentic Puma shoes. The fit is nothing like the others that I had. The sides of the shoes are so minimal that they hardly covered the bottom of the sides of my feet. I measured them against one of my old Pumas and there definitely was a difference. Decided to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Barbh

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I find they fit true to size (but I do have feet have on the narrow size, so I don't know about width). I wear these shoes all the time, and in fact ordered 3 additional pairs! I think they are some of the most comfortable ballet flats that I've owned, and they do look fairly dressy. I wear them with dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Anne S

customer_reviews.title: what'd you get out of your last work shoe?
customer_reviews.text: I worked almost every day in these for 9 months(socks/no socks) before the dreaded stank shoe took over and I had to throw them out. how much did you get out of your last work shoe?
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Great, cute, comfy shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for bopping around the house. I also have a pair in black. I found that sizing varies among the colors. The black pair is a half size larger than my normal size. The grey pair is my standard size.
customer_reviews.author: Dog and Pony Lover

customer_reviews.title: Two big thumbs down. Wonky heel.
customer_reviews.text: I am thinking about returning these. For the price and the brand, I really thought they would have more support than they do. The heel of the shoe makes walking quite strange. It's like I'm wearing a non supportive high heel flat. (Yes, it sounds crazy and feels just as crazy). I'm going on a trip to Europe and doing a lot of walking. These will not be making the trek with me.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie

customer_reviews.title: love it. I have been wearing this style for ...
customer_reviews.text: love it. I have been wearing this style for years. I have a permanent tan line from the shoes on my feet. I have all colors. I wear them all day every where all the time. so comfortable. great for walking ALL DAY. I average 15K steps a day with these!
customer_reviews.author: RoRo

customer_reviews.title: They look so nice but the back of the shoes rub against my ...
customer_reviews.text: They look so nice but the back of the shoes rub against my foot....... my original Puma's are much more pliable....These new shoes are a bit rigid.>> But maybe because they are new..... I will wear them and hopefully they will become my favorite shoes...
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Not for Me
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return these shoes. I wear a size 9, but these were too snug. The top of the shoe was also cut short and hit the bone in the top of my foot making them unbearable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves these and buys them every few years ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these and buys them every few years when they wear out. Her last pair lasted for 3-4 years and she would have worn them for 4 more if I didn't force her to toss them on account that they were getting gross. Puma flats for life..
customer_reviews.author: Frank Balestrery

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comfortable flat
customer_reviews.text: I bought Pumas years ago and agree with the other reviewers that they were a bit softer than this pair, but these are quite satisfactory. No break-in time. I'm wearing with chinos, and they look great. For the price, I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: BeveB

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love these. they are wonderfully comfortable and really cute. I just wish the Puma logo were not so prominently displayed on the front of the shoe. Though, even that is in a discrete black. You have to look straight down at it to notice. I cannot recommend these enough. They are great.
customer_reviews.author: WPB reader

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute, true to color, and comfortable. I LOVE Puma flats they are always so comfortable. I have problems with most flats because they rub my Achilles tendon raw, but these never do, which is why I own so many of them. I will say that I am a pretty solid size 8, but I absolutely need a 7.5 in Puma flats (ALL of them). They also tend to be slightly wider than normal so there's extra room there too.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. S

customer_reviews.title: Liked the old pair better.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as comfortable as my first pair of the same shoes, which I wore out completely due to their comfortable fit. The new pair rub my little toes and give me blisters. The old pair never did that.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Spaizman

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes for walking
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to wear for walks over lunch at my office. They are very comfortable and cute, even with a skirt! Pumas run a little small, so definitely order a 1/2 size up. They were a bit uncomfortable at the widest part of the foot for the first few days, but they stretched a bit and are super comfortable now.
customer_reviews.author: needsmorebutter

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Disney. So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Disney trip. I've started wearing them to break them in. I wore them all day and have rubbed a little on top of my toe but I will wear with socks to loosen them up. They look cute and are really comfy. I feel like they have a good amount of support. I will update once I'm back from Disney.
customer_reviews.author: Boobecca

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes !!
customer_reviews.text: I have these in black and now in grey. LOVE these shoes. They are sporty and can be worn in my work attire. Goes great with dresses or slacks. I wear a size 8, ordered a size 8 and they were perfect. Highly recommend these flats.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable , got them because I don't normally wear sneakers usually wear flats, or heels but since I am now pregnant I was looking for something between a sneaker / flat and this was perfect :)
customer_reviews.author: Lori G

customer_reviews.title: They seemed to be good shoes but too narrow for my feet so I ...
customer_reviews.text: They seemed to be good shoes but too narrow for my feet so I had to send then back. The quality did seem good though. If they had fit I think they would have been nice shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nelms Family

customer_reviews.title: okay not the absolute BEST arch support but i love these flats
customer_reviews.text: okay not the absolute BEST arch support but i love these flats, they're way more comfortable than regular flats so i wore them a lot when i worked retail and was on my feet all day. super sleek design, not clunky at all and go really cute with a lot of stuff actually
customer_reviews.author: Kameron Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: This style was my favorite shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t find this shoe anywhere cause I would have bought another pair already, possibly 2 pairs. I think Puma stopped making them - what a crime! Only Puma product I ever liked.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki D

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes because I wear a lot jean and dark blues. Because I'd already bought the black/pink/grey shoes (in store) identical to the blue/yellow, I felt it was safe to go ahead and order the same size. Unfortunately, I had to break them in on account they were a little short. If there is anything more annoying when purchasing shoes (besides settling on a color) it's breaking them in. Advice...order the next 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Zacara

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this shoe
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this shoe. So glad they were still available as my last pair are completely worn out! They don't fit as tight at the top around the toe as the Puma Bixley Glamm does so no rubbing!
customer_reviews.author: Lacee Kruper

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe, true to size
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable shoe that fit true to size. I have worn it when I want something other than a sneaker but just as comfortable. I have walked extensively in the shoe with no blisters, pain etc. I like it because I am not fond of the pink puma on it so it limits its' use for a more dressy occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Luck

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I owned my first pair a few years ago up until recently when they were destroyed so I was excited to order a new pair because I loved them so much. My new pair came in from Amazon and to my dismay they were extremely small, stiff and uncomfortable compared to my other pair. I've worn them a few times as an attempt to stretch them out but are left with blisters every time. These shoes are cute but the sizing is not consistent beware.
customer_reviews.author: Vincenza Licata

customer_reviews.title: This Shoe is a Keeper
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very comfortable, fits well (I wear a 7M), and does not look sloppy -- retains its shape. It also does not look nerdy -- it is a sneaker without being clumsy. The grey goes well with jeans. I feel that it would look good on young to old. I recently went to an open air flea market, and it was a hot day. My feet loved the cushioned soles, and the mesh (which is not of poor quality) kept the shoe cool. I would definitely recommend this shoe to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: countrygirl

customer_reviews.title: Best Ballerina Flat!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST ballerina flat that I have found that doesn't make your arches and insteps tired!! Puma has a solid design, great look, nice color options, and all around winner with this casual shoe!
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Warning:  The sizing has changed.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Puma Zandy's for many years. I buy a new pair every year. This year, the sizing is completely off. I thought I could wear them right out of the box to work, as I have always done. Two hours in, I had big blisters on the back of both heels. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Cute Sporty Shoe, but...
customer_reviews.text: These were uncomfortable to my (admittedly oversensitive) heels. Also, they look sportier than I thought they would. I'm needing a dress shoe, and for me, this does not do the job.
customer_reviews.author: country girl

customer_reviews.title: Great flats 😀
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great. Was a little worried when first wearing them that they felt stiff but then the materials of the shoe adjusted and stretched around my foot without becoming loose.
customer_reviews.author: Ianthe

customer_reviews.title: Had these shoes forever
customer_reviews.text: They match with everything and lasted about 2 years through multiple washings. Only reason I stopped using them is they started to smell, but if I washed again, I'm sure they would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tunia

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn these shoes a few times, but I love them. They fit well, despite having two different sized feet. There is ample cushion, which can be difficult to find in flats. Although I chose the light grey, I was hesitent about getting them dirty. Thus far, I've managed to step and drive carefully. As long as they don't stretch too much, I may have to purchase another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jemila

customer_reviews.title: but I also love the gray
customer_reviews.text: Since this is my third pair, I am obviously a major fan. The black goes with almost everything, of course, but I also love the gray. I am at two black and one gray... Perfect DC shoe for walking, jumping on Metro and still feeling comfortable walking into a restaurant!
customer_reviews.author: Tashi

customer_reviews.title: Great little athletic ballet flat!
customer_reviews.text: Have had a couple of pairs, and they are always cute and a nice upgrade from flip-flops. Needed a black pair and these fit, left and right, on the 1st try! Also, threw my older light grey and violet pairs in the wash, and they came out great, so don't give up on your faves till you try that. Will be back for more:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Puma shoes
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 6- 61/2 I bought 6 1/2 and fit perfect right out of the box. I'm going to be traveling to Europe next week and will wear these. I hope they feel as good as they do now.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: which feels great. Hope they start selling the other colors again ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving the cushion in the heel! Looking forward to wearing these as the weather warms up. I have very narrow feet so these were slightly wide, but nothing I'm not used to. I originally got the size 10 (too wide for comfort) but returned for a 9.5. which feels great. Hope they start selling the other colors again eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz Peterson

customer_reviews.title: ... an old pair size 8 1/2 that was a perfect fit. Bought a new pair but they feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I had an old pair size 8 1/2 that was a perfect fit. Bought a new pair but they feel tight like they are too small esp in toe box.Get a 1/2 size up. Love the shoe though.Hopefully I can get them stretched out.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoe, but they seem to run a bit smaller than my other shoes. I typically wear a 7 1/2 shoe but thankfully I looked at a few reviews that said they ordered a half size larger and the shoes were perfect. I did the same and I'm very happy that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Messer

customer_reviews.title: Cute for zipping around town.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are adorable...A cross between sport and somewhat dressy. Comfortable and nicely constructed. The black patent gives them their polish. The black mesh gives they their look of sport. The compliments I get are constant. This is my second pair, and I also ordered them in grey.
customer_reviews.author: Compassionata

customer_reviews.title: You gotta get these.
customer_reviews.text: I can't wear heels right now due to an MCL sprain so I needed comfy flats to wear to work. These look great and are comfortable. Most flats don't have support and rub the back of my heel wrong but these are great. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sanchez

product_meta.title: PUMA Women's Zandy Ballet Flat
product_meta.description:
Andy wn's is a feminine, sporty ballet flat inspired by cycling. Unique cycling details and a mix of materials add fun and playfulness- look at the footbed, Outsole and toe! Andy is comfortable for all day wear due to the moisture wicking lining and eco-ortholite footbed. She will never want to take these off!.

Step out in style with this sporty chic flat from PUMA. The Zandy features a synthetic and mesh upper with a branded hook-and-loop detail at the vamp. The fabric lining hugs the foot and wicks away moisture to keep the foot cool and dry. A rubber sole delivers extra grip and traction when you're on the go.

PUMA is the global athletic brand that successfully fuses influences from sport, lifestyle and fashion. PUMA's unique industry perspective delivers the unexpected in sport-lifestyle footwear, apparel and accessories, through technical innovation and revolutionary design.

See more
feature_bullets: Lightweight ballet flat featuring breathable mesh upper with logoed hook-and-loop strap at toe
